title: I received my Pixel 3a XL and in love. But mine missing the + to add eSim though I am with Android 1
content:
My phone is missing + sign to add a new eSim: https://photos.app.goo.gl/KrgVNsZaW9hYACHy7
I am with the latest 10 OS already.

Please, any solution?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
